domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@JoeBiden I can protect my sacred right to vote just fine when I vote at a polling place in November. 

Using disenfranchisement ploy, really? Voting by mail has always been an option, it just shouldn't be the ONLY option. 

Prohibiting voting in person is illegal

https://t.co/wROImoOSCD
